name: Triz
description:
Triz is a puzzle game that challenges the player to think outside of the box - or, rather, triangle. Players are free to rotate triangles in hexagon-shape patterns but must flip the entire board of triangles to one color by the same hexagons. How fast can you solve your puzzles?

(This game was submitted as part of Global Game Jam 2022. This is a slightly updated version with some changes to enhance the game.)
